Class TransactionSummaryView

java.lang.Object
TransactionSummaryView
public class TransactionSummaryView extends Object
The TransactionSummaryView class represents the view or user interface for displaying transaction summaries in a vending machine. It provides methods to show transaction details and summaries to the user. This class is responsible for presenting transaction information in a user-friendly format. It communicates with the vending machine's TransactionSummaryController to retrieve transaction data and update the display.
